article.title: Baird Assigned to Office of the Assistant Secretary of the Air Force for Acquisition

tags.tag: Office of the Assistant Secretary of the Air Force for Acquisition

article.text: Col. Mark A. Baird, USAF, has been selected for the grade of brigadier general and assigned as commander, Air Force Installation Contracting Agency, Office of the Assistant Secretary of the Air Force for Acquisition, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio.
